# App tags

**API Collection**

Read or modify Apple created app tags.

## Overview

Use the app tag resource to read the tags that Apple applied to your app and remove tags that are not representative of your app. To learn more, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-app-information/manage-app-tags].

## Reading app tag information

- **List app tags**: List all app tags for a specific app.
- **List app tags Ids**: List all app tag IDs for a specific app.
- **List territory Ids for an app tag**: List territory IDs for an app tag.
- **List territories for an app tag**: List territory availability for a specific app tag.

## Modifying app tag information

- **Modify app tags**: Opt out of app tags for a specific app.

## Objects

- **AppAppTagsLinkagesResponse**: A response that contains a list of IDs of related resources.
- **AppTag**: The data structure that represents an app tag resource.
- **AppTagResponse**: A response that contains a single app tag response resource.
- **AppTagsResponse**: A response that contains a list of app tags response resources.
- **AppTagTerritoriesLinkagesResponse**: A response that contains a list of IDs of related resources.
- **AppTagUpdateRequest**: The request body you use to update an app tag update request.

## Managing App Information and Versions

- **App Infos**: Manage or read the app metadata that applies across all versions of your app.
- **App Info Localizations**: Manage the app metadata that is localized and appears on the App Store.
- **App Store Versions**: Manage versions of your app that are available in App Store.
- **App Store Version Localizations**: Create and maintain version-specific App Store metadata that’s localized.
- **Routing App Coverages**: Manage geographic coverage files for apps that use location to provide routing information.
- **Accessibility declarations**: Manage accessibility metadata for your apps per device family.
